// Pivot 0, 0
int pinballdefinitivo[18] = {
	228, 356,
	227, 352,
	213, 353,
	188, 355,
	174, 382,
	173, 388,
	175, 392,
	190, 383,
	223, 361
};

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000
float pinballdefinitivo[18] = {
	0.508929f, 0.485014f,
	0.506696f, 0.479564f,
	0.475446f, 0.480926f,
